com.tarsec.javadoc.pdfdoclet.elements
Class CellBorderPadding

java.lang.Object
  com.lowagie.text.Rectangle
      com.lowagie.text.pdf.PdfPCell
          com.tarsec.javadoc.pdfdoclet.elements.CellBorderPadding
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.lowagie.text.Element, com.lowagie.text.MarkupAttributes
public class CellBorderPadding
extends com.lowagie.text.pdf.PdfPCell

Customized version(s) of PdfPCell with a border of with 1 (gray) and a padding of 6.

Version:
$Revision: 1.4 $
Author:
Marcel Schoen
